custom-action.name: sentsignedethertransaction
custom-action.description:
Send BlockChain signed Transaction in the network .
Possible parameters are: - ipOfTheWhiteblockNode (required): Ip of one of the Whiteblock Node Default value is "Ip of one of the Whiteblock Node ". - from (required): Address of the account that will send the transaction Default value is "Address of the account that will send the transaction". - to (required): Address of the account that will receive the transaction Default value is "Address of the account that will receive the transaction". - privatekey (required): Keystore of the from account Default value is "Keystore of the from account ". - publickey (required): Keystore of the from account Default value is "Keystore of the from account ". - amount (required): Amount to send Default value is "Amount to send". - TraceMode (optional): enable loggin details : true: enable ; false : Disable Default value is "enable logging ".
